values: 扔；丢；抛；投；掷；掷（色子）；摔；使处于；使陷入（某种状态）；按动；扳动；推动；把…对准；故意输掉；照射（光线）；挥拳猛击；举行聚会；猛推；使心烦意乱；突然发作（脾气等）；使劲撞；猛动（头、臂、腿）；使迅猛地摔倒在地；（在陶钧上）把…拉制成坯
扔；抛；投掷；掷球；掷（色子）；摔；抛物线；抛掷距离；薄毯；披巾；沙发罩；沙发套；落差；水头；位移；偏移

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 投掷者；抛油环；制陶坯的工人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用力投掷，或因感情激动而粗暴地或漫无目的地扔东西。
普通用词，使用广泛，仅指用力抛掷，不涉及动作方式或感情色彩。
常可与throw互换，指迅速扔出一个重量较轻的物体。
指无什么目的地、轻轻地、随意地掷或扔，所扔掷的东西一般都比较轻。
通常指用力投掷，动作迅猛，所投掷的距离也较远。
指随意地、轻轻地掷或扔，侧重方向性和有明确的目标。

word_group.brief_definition: 投身于；热衷于；积极从事
大发雷霆；愤怒地举起双手
装饰性的随意摆放的小地毯
认输, 承认失败, 放弃努力
课以重罚；从严惩罚；狠狠责备
对…持批评（或不支持）态度；对…泼冷水
认输；放弃斗争；承认失败
想挽回损失却适得其反；贴上老本

bilingual.source: Now who can throw the ball far?
You mustn't throw rubbish in the street.
Throw the ball to me! shouted Rahim.
bilingual.target: 拉希姆喊道，把球扔给我！
球在那儿，贾贝尔。扔出去！

bilingual.source: We want to play! Throw the ball to them!
bilingual.target: 我们想玩！把球扔给他们！

bilingual.source: Say Catch and throw and ask pupils to repeat.
bilingual.target: 说“接住和扔”并让学生重复。

bilingual.source: The fire begged, "Please throw sticks onto my flames."
bilingual.target: 火恳求道：“请把木棍扔到我的火焰上。”

list.abstract: throw（英[θrəʊ]，美[θroʊ]），英语单词，作动词为投；掷；抛。作名词为投掷；薄毯；落差。短语搭配有throw away（扔掉）。例句为“We throw flour at our friends!（我们向我们的朋友扔面粉！）” throw动词类近义词有cast、pitch等。现在分词为throwing。过去式为threw。过去分词为thrown。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was a kid, some guy took my favorite toy and threw it up there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我小时候，有个家伙抢走了我最喜欢的玩具，把它丢在那里。

yingyinNormal.en: Keep it. Don't throw that at me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你留着吧别，用那玩意儿扔我。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh-oh, Pottery Barn. You can throw the rest away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 陶瓷货仓，剩下的可以扔了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it's all dirty. You should throw this out. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好脏，你最好拿去扔。好。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't just throw everything in the closet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能只把东西都往衣橱里扔啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Now throw it away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 扔一边去。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, you know what? You want to help out? Slide something underneath it like a throw pillow. Throw!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想来帮忙吗？扔点东西过来垫着，比如靠枕。扔球球！

yingyinNormal.en: Why would you throw a rock at a child? I just said I wouldn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要对一个孩子扔石头？我说了我不会扔。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we have to throw something out. How about this box? No. Not my hats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我们总得扔掉一些东西吧。扔这个盒子怎么样？不行！我的帽子可不能扔！

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we have to throw something out. How about this box? No. Not my hats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我们总得扔掉一些东西吧。扔这个盒子怎么样？不行！我的帽子可不能扔！

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me who he is. Oh. Change of plan. Throw her out!
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉我他是谁。计划有变，把她扔出去！

yingyinNormal.en: You know how you throw your jacket on a chair at the end of the day? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们下班回家，会把外套扔到椅子上。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: This has to look like an escape. So, you just throw me out anywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须看上去像是落荒而逃的，所以，快把我随便扔出去。

yingyinNormal.en: You still have this. Yes. It felt wrong to throw it out, for some reason.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还留着这个。是啊，不知道为什么，就是不舍得扔。

yingyinNormal.en: Is this all stuff you want me to try on? No, this is stuff I want you to throw out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有这些你都要让我试穿？不，这些是我想让你扔了的。

yingyinNormal.en: George can't throw the ball past Mummy Pig. Come on, George. Give the ball to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治没有办法把球仍给佩琪。来吧，乔治，快把球扔给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Well done, George. Now you throw the ball to Peppa. Oop. Try again. Oh. Try again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做得好，乔治，现在你把球扔给佩琪，再试一遍，再试一遍吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on, throw on and you'll get presents. It's a moth. I'm collecting fruit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧，继续扔，你会拿到礼物的。这是只蛾子。我收集的是水果。

yingyinNormal.en: Chewie, throw them in a pod. We'll drop them at the nearest inhabited planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丘伊，把他们扔到飞行舱里，我们一会儿把他们放到最近的有人的星球上。

yingyinNormal.en: The cookies are named after a town in Massachusetts. And then I'd throw the cookies away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个饼干是用马萨诸塞州的一个镇命名的，然后我再把饼干扔了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 投; 掷; 摔; 丢

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 推翻；打倒；投（球）过远；终止；结束；打翻在地；击倒；投球超过

word_family.mean: v. 投；掷；抛；扔；使突然陷入；摔倒；把…拉成坯；大发；使发作；举行；举办

sense_info_list.en: make someone or something be in a particular state

examination_example.sentence: Danaher says, "I might feel rather different" — perhaps different enough to <highlight>throw</highlight> himself into a hobby.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 达纳赫说，“我可能感觉相当不同”——也许不同到足以让他自己投入到一种爱好中。

examination_example.sentence: Gap year experiences can lessen the blow when it comes to adjusting to college and being <highlight>thrown</highlight> into a brand new environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在涉及到适应大学以及处于一个全新环境的时候，间隔年的经历可以减缓冲击。

examination_example.sentence: In the meantime, the court <highlight>threw</highlight> out the FCC's attempt to block all state rules on net neutrality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，法院否决了联邦通信委员会（FCC）试图阻止所有关于网络中立性的州规则。

sense_info_list.zh: 投; 掷; 摔; 丢

sense_info_list.en: cause to fall
the distance something is or may be sent with a motion of the arm
make someone feel upset, confused, or surprised
have a sudden period of bad-tempered behavior, violent emotion
deliberately lose a game or contest that you should have won
direct something at someone or something
make your voice sound as if it is coming from another person or place
send light or shade onto something
move a switch, handle, or others to operate something
move your body or part of it quickly or suddenly
move something suddenly and with force
put on or take off in a hurry

word_usage.usage: throw作动词指“使处于、使陷入（某种状态）”时，通常用被动语态，如：We were thrown into confusion by the news. 我们被那消息弄得惊慌失措。

表示“投、掷”时：
throw指用力抛掷，不涉及动作方式或感情色彩。
toss尤指随意地扔、掷比较轻的东西，如书、报纸等。
pitch通常指仔细瞄准后用力地掷或扔，侧重方向性及明确的目标。
fling指用力投掷；也可指感情激动时粗鲁而随便地扔东西，此时常伴有某种较强烈的感情色彩。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使处于; 使陷入(某种状态)
照射(光线); 投射(阴影)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 推翻；打倒；投（球）过远；终止；结束；打翻在地；击倒；投球超过

word_family.mean: v. 投；掷；抛；扔；使突然陷入；摔倒；把…拉成坯；大发；使发作；举行；举办

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 投身于；热衷于；积极从事

examination_example.sentence: I couldn't stay there any longer, their business practices <highlight>threw</highlight> me off the roof.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不能再呆在那里了，他们的商业行为把我从屋顶上扔了下来。

examination_example.sentence: The plan was to reduce prices to move the stock, arguably encouraging consumers to buy and <highlight>throw</highlight> away with little thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该计划是通过降价来转移库存，可以说是鼓励消费者不假思索地购买和丢弃。

examination_example.sentence: In the U.S. alone, the average person <highlight>throws</highlight> away their body weight in rubbish every month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅在美国，平均每人每月所扔垃圾的重量都和自己的体重相当。

sense_info_list.en: make someone or something be in a particular state
sense_info_list.zh: 使处于; 使陷入(某种状态)

examination_example.sentence: Employee engagement, meanwhile, was assessed with statements like "I really <highlight>throw</highlight> myself into my work."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，员工参与度是通过“我真的全身心地投入到工作中去了”这样的陈述来评估的。

sense_info_list.en: send light or shade onto something
sense_info_list.zh: 照射(光线); 投射(阴影)

sense_info_list.en: the distance something is or may be sent with a motion of the arm

word_usage.usage:
throw sth. at ... 的意思是“把某物向...扔去”，含有寻衅的意味。无恶意的用throw sth. to ...表示。
The stranger threw stones at the dog.
那陌生人朝狗扔石头。
The children threw some peas to the pigeon.
小孩丢豆子给鸽子吃。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 推翻；打倒；投（球）过远；终止；结束；打翻在地；击倒；投球超过

word_family.mean: v. 投；掷；抛；扔；使突然陷入；摔倒；把…拉成坯；大发；使发作；举行；举办

examination_example.sentence: You can't just <highlight>throw</highlight> a sandwich in a backpack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不能把三明治扔进背包里。

examination_example.sentence: An angry customer had <highlight>thrown</highlight> a chicken at his head after complaining about how long she had waited to be served.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位愤怒的顾客在抱怨她等了多久才上菜后，把一只鸡扔到了他的头上。

examination_example.sentence: Once you are done demonstrating whatever concept was in the textbook, you <highlight>throw</highlight> away the pipe cleaners, the straws, the cardboard tubes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦完成对教科书某个概念的演示，你就会扔掉管道清洁器、吸管和纸板管。

sense_info_list.en: the distance something is or may be sent with a motion of the arm
cause to fall

word_usage.usage:
throw sth. at ... 的意思是“把某物向...扔去”，含有寻衅的意味。无恶意的用throw sth. to ...表示。
The stranger threw stones at the dog.
那陌生人朝狗扔石头。
The children threw some peas to the pigeon.
小孩丢豆子给鸽子吃。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 扔掉；丢弃；浪费(机会、优势或好处)

examination_example.sentence: Jenna <highlight>threw</highlight> the burnt piece into the sink and put in the other slice of bread.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍娜把烧焦的面包片丢进水槽，然后放入另一片面包。

examination_example.sentence: As we accumulated more devices, however, we didn't <highlight>throw</highlight> out our old ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，随着我们积累了更多的设备，我们并没有扔掉旧的设备。

examination_example.sentence: In particular, I <highlight>threw</highlight> myself into the world of musicals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尤其是，我投身于音乐剧的世界。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 伸(四肢); 挺(胸)仰(首); 挥(拳)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 投身于；热衷于；积极从事
大发雷霆；愤怒地举起双手

examination_example.sentence: Secondly, you can pick them up and <highlight>throw</highlight> them into a dustbin (垃圾箱).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，你可以捡起来扔进垃圾箱。

examination_example.sentence: Do you often <highlight>throw</highlight> away things you don't need anymore?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您是否经常扔掉不再需要的东西？

examination_example.sentence: It was not you who <highlight>threw</highlight> them away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 扔掉它们的不是你。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Throwing</highlight> off poverty
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脱贫

sense_info_list.en: move your body or part of it quickly or suddenly
sense_info_list.zh: 伸(四肢); 挺(胸)仰(首); 挥(拳)

examination_example.sentence: She happened to see Amy <highlight>throw</highlight> up her hands and go down, with a scaring cry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她碰巧看到艾米挥起双手，吓得大叫着走了下去。

examination_example.sentence: Dan <highlight>threw</highlight> himself onto his chair, silent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 丹坐在椅子上，一言不发。

sense_info_list.en: become involved in it very actively or enthusiastically

examination_example.sentence: Before you camp in your local park or <highlight>throw</highlight> a party at a library, remember that there are rules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你在当地的公园露营或者投身于图书馆派对之前，请记住这里有规定。

examination_example.sentence: When I was 13, half my friends <highlight>threw</highlight> themselves into kickball.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我 13 岁时，我一半的朋友都投入踢球活动中。

word_usage.usage:
throw sth. at ... 的意思是“把某物向...扔去”，含有寻衅的意味。无恶意的用throw sth. to ...表示。
The stranger threw stones at the dog.
那陌生人朝狗扔石头。
The children threw some peas to the pigeon.
小孩丢豆子给鸽子吃。
